```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(tibble)
library(ggplot2)
```


#Download the datasets
```{r get the data, cache=TRUE}
#individual dataset
ind <- "chs_individual.csv"
if (!file.exists(ind))
  download.file("https://github.com/USCbiostats/data-science-data/blob/master/01_chs/chs_individual.csv", destfile = ind)

ind <- read.csv(ind)
ind <- as.tibble(ind)

#regional dataset
reg <- "chs_regional.csv"
if (!file.exists(reg))
  download.file("https://github.com/USCbiostats/data-science-data/blob/master/01_chs/chs_regional.csv", destfile = reg)

reg <- read.csv(reg)
reg <- as.tibble(reg)
```
